scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run format:check
scripts.sync:docs:readme: bun run --filter @outfitter/docs build && bun run packages/docs/dist/cli.js docs sync-readme --cwd .
scripts.sync:docs: bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts sync docs --cwd . && bun run sync:docs:readme
scripts.sync:docs:release:llms: bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms && bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms-full
scripts.verify:docs:release:llms: bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms && bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms-full && git diff --exit-code -- docs/llms.txt docs/llms-full.txt && test -z "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard -- docs/llms.txt docs/llms-full.txt)"
scripts.release: bun run build && bun run scripts/changeset-publish.ts
scripts.release:canary: npx changeset version --snapshot canary && bun run build && bun run scripts/changeset-publish.ts --tag canary
